scripts.build:dev: pnpm run clean && pnpm run set-config development && tsc
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run set-config production && tsc
scripts.build:bundle:iife: pnpm run build:prod && mkdir -p bundle && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=browser --format=iife --global-name=DialogSDK --minify --outfile=bundle/dialog-sdk.$npm_package_version.min.js
scripts.deploy:cdn: pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run build:bundle:iife && pnpm run deploy:s3 && pnpm run deploy:cloudfront
scripts.deploy:cdn:publish: pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run build:bundle:iife && pnpm run deploy:s3 && pnpm run deploy:cloudfront && pnpm publish
